text: FX is an Belgian pay television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA. The channel originally launched on 12 February 2010 and started broadcasting in 16:9 widescreen aspect ratio on 24 January 2014 but was replaced by the Belgian version of Discovery Home & Health on 6 March 2016. On 25 January 2024, Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA announced that the Belgian version of Discovery Home & Health would be relaunched as FX on 6 April 2024. == Logos == file:FX International logo.svg|12 February 2010-6 March 2016 file:Discovery H&H.png;|6 March 2016-6 April 2024 file:FX Logo 2023.svg|6 April 2024-present Category:Television channels in Europe
title: FX (Belgian TV channel)
